member.name: T:ATS.Database.Program
member.summary: tests a flat database and the facade with string arrays.
member.remarks: Test is implemented as extension methods.

member.name: M:ATS.Database.Program.Test(ATS.Database.IModel{System.String},System.String[])
member.summary: process commands until end of file.
member.remarks: Can pass an input file name as argument to simplify use from VS 2008.

member.name: M:ATS.Database.Program.Test(ATS.Database.IModel{System.String},System.IO.TextReader,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: process commands until end of file.
